Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.views.controllers.scenes.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Controller for handling user login functionality. This controller manages the login screen, user authentication, and navigation to the dashboard or sign-up screen.
  • Handles user input for username and password.
  • Validates credentials by checking against stored user data.
  • Manages the choice of application language using a dropdown menu.
  • Transitions to the Dashboard or Sign-up screen based on user actions.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the login controller by setting up necessary controllers and configuring the language selection options.

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin()
      Handles the login process. Verifies that the username and password fields are filled, authenticates the user, and transitions to the dashboard screen if login is successful. Displays error messages if the fields are empty, the user is not found, or if the password is incorrect.

    • onSignUp

      public void onSignUp()
      Navigates the user to the sign-up screen for registration. If the screen cannot be loaded, an error message is shown.
